breakthroughPP.gui

Class InfoMovePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • breakthroughPP.gui.InfoMovePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Showable, Setting, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class InfoMovePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Setting, Showable
    The western panel which shows a list of moves made in the past. Georg-August University Goettingen APP breakthroughPP SoSe 2016 Gr CodeSalat
    Author:
    Artur Zorn
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setMoveArea

        public void setMoveArea(java.lang.String newtext,
               int colorPlayer)
        Add a move to area which shows the last moves (log). The font-color depends on the colorPlayer.
        Parameters:
        newtext - a new line which is written in the log-box.
        colorPlayer - the color of the current player.

      • setText

        public void setText(java.lang.String newtext,
           javax.swing.text.SimpleAttributeSet set)
        add a Text with AttributeSet
        Parameters:
        newtext - Any String to add to moveArea. Warning dont need "\n"
        set - Need a SimpleAttribute from static block

      • formatMoveToString

        private java.lang.String formatMoveToString(Move newmove)
        Change the String of Move. Example moveFormat ="B2 -> C2"
        Parameters:
        newmove - the new move which is going to be written in the log-box.
        Returns:
        the string representation of the last move.
